document.full_text: mitt romney's first visit to iowa this year was cut short when burned popcorn set off fire alarms, but not before assuring voters that he was "fully committed" to competing in the state's caucuses.
document.title: in iowa, romney hears applause, and alarms
lines_and_colors: mitt romney's first visit to iowa this year was cut short when burned popcorn set off fire alarms, but not before assuring voters that he was "fully committed" to competing in the state's caucuses.
